FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Rated to support a payload of up to 7 lb (3.1kg), this stabilizer is ideal for DSLRs with small rig systems, as well as pro camcorders. It will allow for the capture of steady handheld video from a compact camera system, with a difference that is unmistakable from unstabilized footage.
FEATURES_RAW: Rated to support a payload of up to 7 lb (3.1kg), this stabilizer is ideal for DSLRs with small rig systems, as well as pro camcorders. It will allow for the capture of steady handheld video from a compact camera system, with a difference that is unmistakable from unstabilized footage.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The height-adjustable gimbal can be positioned anywhere along the center column. This helps you balance heavier loads by moving the gimbal higher up on the column, reducing the amount of counterweight you need. Fewer counterweights means less stress on your arm, which results in longer shooting times before fatigue sets in.
FEATURES_RAW: The height-adjustable gimbal can be positioned anywhere along the center column. This helps you balance heavier loads by moving the gimbal higher up on the column, reducing the amount of counterweight you need. Fewer counterweights means less stress on your arm, which results in longer shooting times before fatigue sets in.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Before adding more counterweights to the stabilizer, you can extend the center column to help balance your camcorder. The stabilizer has a maximum extended height of 48.75" and a minimum height of 20.25".
FEATURES_RAW: Before adding more counterweights to the stabilizer, you can extend the center column to help balance your camcorder. The stabilizer has a maximum extended height of 48.75" and a minimum height of 20.25".

FEATURE_NAME: Quick Release Plate with Easy Balance Adjustment
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: A quick release plate provides a fast way to mount your camera on the stabilizer, and allows you to easily adjust the forward/backward and left/right position of your camera to help achieve perfect balance. The plate is locked in place using a ratchet-style locking lever. The ratcheting feature lets you re-position the lever if your camera position prevents you from fully turning it.
FEATURES_RAW: A quick release plate provides a fast way to mount your camera on the stabilizer, and allows you to easily adjust the forward/backward and left/right position of your camera to help achieve perfect balance. The plate is locked in place using a ratchet-style locking lever. The ratcheting feature lets you re-position the lever if your camera position prevents you from fully turning it.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The base of the stabilizer features four rubber feet which retract to revel metal spikes, allowing you to safely rest the stabilizer on a variety of surfaces once fatigue sets in. The feet even allow the stabilizer to function as a short monopod, providing added versatility when shooting. Two posts on the base platform accept the included counterweight discs for adjusting the system's center of gravity. The counterweights are secured in place via thumbscrews.
FEATURES_RAW: The base of the stabilizer features four rubber feet which retract to revel metal spikes, allowing you to safely rest the stabilizer on a variety of surfaces once fatigue sets in. The feet even allow the stabilizer to function as a short monopod, providing added versatility when shooting. Two posts on the base platform accept the included counterweight discs for adjusting the system's center of gravity. The counterweights are secured in place via thumbscrews.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The stabilizer features textured rubber grip on the handle for comfort and to aid against slippage with sweaty palms. There is also rubber grip on the center-column twist-locks for easier tightening and loosening. The textured surfaces also make them easy to find in low-light situations.
FEATURES_RAW: The stabilizer features textured rubber grip on the handle for comfort and to aid against slippage with sweaty palms. There is also rubber grip on the center-column twist-locks for easier tightening and loosening. The textured surfaces also make them easy to find in low-light situations.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The built-in bubble levels on the quick release plate can assist with precise balancing while setting up the stabilizer. This is useful when setting up on a hill or other uneven surfaces, where it's difficult to determine by eye whether the camera is level.
FEATURES_RAW: The built-in bubble levels on the quick release plate can assist with precise balancing while setting up the stabilizer. This is useful when setting up on a hill or other uneven surfaces, where it's difficult to determine by eye whether the camera is level.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The four included counterweights fit onto the two counterweight posts, which allows you to add them one at a time to adjust the unit's center of gravity.
FEATURES_RAW: The four included counterweights fit onto the two counterweight posts, which allows you to add them one at a time to adjust the unit's center of gravity.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: A padded carrying case is included for easy transport and storage of stabilizer and counterweights.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The stabilizer makes it easy to balance your camcorder or camera rig, even if the weight is unevenly distributed. Four segmented counterweights are included, which screw into sockets at the bottom of the center column and offer weight compensation along two axes. Each counterweight consists of four individual pieces that screw into each other, letting you add or remove pieces one at a time to adjust and fine-tune the system's center of gravity.

Powered using three 18650 rechargeable lithium-ion batteries

5V USB port on handle to charge smartphone or power included compact LED light

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The large knurled hand wheel on the Hammerhead Pro provides a sure grip and smooth focusing action. A small thumbscrew at the base of the gearbox can be tightened or loosened to adjust gearbox stiffness.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Easily repeat focus moves by setting the end stops of the focus move on the hand wheel itself. Release the stops to regain full rotation of the hand wheel, or to just reset them for your next shot.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: With shorter lenses, connecting the follow focus can be difficult if the lens gear is fixed. The Hammerhead Pro features a side-switchable drive gear, meaning the drive gear can be mounted on the side closer to the camera for working with short lenses commonly found on mirrorless cameras.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: "Being able to use a small, lightweight, super-portable pack like this just makes things so much easier. FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
FP, for "focal plane," produces a succession of flashes at a very fast speed in
order to illuminate the sensor as evenly as possible when shooting with fast
shutter speeds (typically above 1/250s). This series of flashes is usually not
noticeable with the naked eye. When using the FP settings, be aware that the
flash will output at its lowest power setting to compensate for the fast burst
speeds.
FEATURES_RAW:
FP, for "focal plane," produces a succession of flashes at a very fast speed in
order to illuminate the sensor as evenly as possible when shooting with fast
shutter speeds (typically above 1/250s). This series of flashes is usually not
noticeable with the naked eye. When using the FP settings, be aware that the
flash will output at its lowest power setting to compensate for the fast burst
speeds.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
Ultra-fast 0.4 sec. recycle time at full power means you'll never miss a shot while waiting for your light to recycle
Speedy 1/5,000 sec. flash duration and 10 fps continuous shooting speed make this monolight great for event work as well as high-speed photography
Flash power output is up to 400Ws, with precise output control in 0.1 stop increments over a 6 stop range
Built-in 8mm umbrella mount and S-type bayonet mount allow you to attach light-modifiers like umbrellas, softboxes, and beauty dishes to customize and shape your light
Fan-cooling system, heat sinks, and speed-dedicated internal components prevent overheating when shooting at high speeds
FEATURES_RAW:
<li>Ultra-fast 0.4 sec. recycle time at full power means you'll never miss a shot while waiting for your light to recycle
<li>Speedy 1/5,000 sec. flash duration and 10 fps continuous shooting speed make this monolight great for event work as well as high-speed photography
<li>Flash power output is up to 400Ws, with precise output control in 0.1 stop increments over a 6 stop range
<li>Built-in 8mm umbrella mount and S-type bayonet mount allow you to attach light-modifiers like umbrellas, softboxes, and beauty dishes to customize and shape your light
<li>Fan-cooling system, heat sinks, and speed-dedicated internal components prevent overheating when shooting at high speeds

Triggers flash wirelessly from up to 150'
Adjusts power levels remotely
Turns modeling lamp and audio alert on and off
16 Channels and groups
USB powered, no batteries

FEATURE_NAME: A Ring Light and a Softbox in One
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Ringbox encircles your camera's lens like a ring light and diffuses your flash's light like a softbox to produce a beautiful, soft lighting effect. It helps to evenly illuminate your subject and reduce unwanted shadows and intrusive lighting in the background, adding depth to the photo and drawing attention to your subject
FEATURES_RAW: The Ringbox encircles your camera's lens like a ring light and diffuses your flash's light like a softbox to produce a beautiful, soft lighting effect. It helps to evenly illuminate your subject and reduce unwanted shadows and intrusive lighting in the background, adding depth to the photo and drawing attention to your subject

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Ringbox is a great solution for macro and close-up photography, allowing you get close to your subject with shadowless lighting that exposes every detail. Ideal for portraiture or fashion shooting, the Ringbox provides flattering, flat cosmetic effects and creates attention-grabbing ring-shaped catchlights in subject's eyes
FEATURES_RAW: The Ringbox is a great solution for macro and close-up photography, allowing you get close to your subject with shadowless lighting that exposes every detail. Ideal for portraiture or fashion shooting, the Ringbox provides flattering, flat cosmetic effects and creates attention-grabbing ring-shaped catchlights in subject's eyes

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Ringbox collapses to an 8" disc, weighs one pound, and comes with a zippered carrying bag so you can take it nearly anywhere you take your camera
FEATURES_RAW: The Ringbox collapses to an 8" disc, weighs one pound, and comes with a zippered carrying bag so you can take it nearly anywhere you take your camera

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Compatible with most DSLRs and speedlights, the Ringbox is a great fit for the gear you already own
FEATURES_RAW: Compatible with most DSLRs and speedlights, the Ringbox is a great fit for the gear you already own

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The flash bracket's contoured handle makes the Hexi 24 ideal for run-and-gun shooting. The integrated light stand mount is also compatible with any 5/8" stud
FEATURES_RAW: The flash bracket's contoured handle makes the Hexi 24 ideal for run-and-gun shooting. The integrated light stand mount is also compatible with any 5/8" stud

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Hexi 24 features a front diffuser and inner baffle and a high-output silver interior to minimize light loss while rendering a soft quality of light. The baffle and diffuser are removable to allow for a variety of looks.
FEATURES_RAW: The Hexi 24 features a front diffuser and inner baffle and a high-output silver interior to minimize light loss while rendering a soft quality of light. The baffle and diffuser are removable to allow for a variety of looks.

FEATURES_RAW: At 24 x 36" the Impact Parabox is a great match for hotshoe flashes, compact studio strobes and portable battery-powered strobe systems

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Photographers on the go will appreciate the Parabox's rugged dual-rod design, which contributes to a quick and easy setup. This is ideal for wedding and event photography, on-location portrait shoots, or any situation where time is limited and professional results are expected
FEATURES_RAW: Photographers on the go will appreciate the Parabox's rugged dual-rod design, which contributes to a quick and easy setup. This is ideal for wedding and event photography, on-location portrait shoots, or any situation where time is limited and professional results are expected

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Parabox Softbox features an 8mm umbrella shaft, making it compatible with any standard umbrella mount or adapter. Since a speed ring is not required, the Parabox is a good value for beginner photographers and professionals alike
FEATURES_RAW: The Parabox Softbox features an 8mm umbrella shaft, making it compatible with any standard umbrella mount or adapter. Since a speed ring is not required, the Parabox is a good value for beginner photographers and professionals alike

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Two zippered panels allow for vertical (portrait) and horizontal (landscape) positioning, while the reflective silver interior, removable front diffuser, and compatibility with touch-fastener grids offer additional light modification opportunities. Use as a rim light, hair light, accent light, or as a main light

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Built-in 2.4 GHz wireless Receiver with 16 channels and 4 distinct groups of flashesThe included 16-channel, 4 group radio remote control transmitter gives you wireless control of up to seven lights from distances up to 328'. It allows you to adjust functions like flash power, the modeling lamp, audio beep and slave mode6-stop stepless power control range from full to 1/32 in 1/10 stop incrementsFast recycling time: 0.2 - 1.5 secA large easily-read LCD display on the rear of the unit gives you a clear indication of chosen settingsPre-flash Detector System to enable use of a wide range of on-camera flashesMultiple Modeling Light Modes: Proportional, Independent, OffThe soft-start function of modeling lamp protects the subject's and photographer's eyes, and increases the working life of the lampSturdy, functional, and professional aluminum alloy housingAnti-static, tactile rubberized surface treatment provides comfort and utilityTwo Kinds of Recycling Reminder: Programmable ready beep function and modeling lamp visual indicator. The modeling lamp dims during recycling and comes on again when fully recycledFan-cooling provides longevity for the head's electronics, flashtube, and modeling lampOver-Heating Protection: When the flash reaches its maximum operating temperature it slows recycling time to reduce heat, rather than delay the shoot for a cool-down interval12.5 Amp fuse shuts the head down if necessary to prevent damage by electrical spikesLow 5 VDC sync voltage protects your camera's electronicsPower auto-dump drains excess power from the capacitors when you reduce the output to guaranty accurate exposuresStand bracket with extra umbrella fitting for larger umbrella shaftsShifting pan/tilt support allows you to use large, pro-sized accessoriesCompatible with Bowens Reflectors: Choose from a wide assortment of light-shapers that use the Bowens S-Type mountTwo white umbrellas with permanent black backing soften the light and set up quicklySoftbox with Speedring: The 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior has a removable front diffuser and interior baffle. The reflective interior minimizes light loss while the removable diffusers maximize creative optionsLight Stands: 2, air-cushioned, 9.4', aluminum stands have repositionable studs to permit different mounting anglesThe sturdy, wheeled, padded case has ample room for everything in the kit. Separate zippered compartments keep stands and umbrellas apart from the fixtures
FEATURES_RAW:
• Built-in 2.4 GHz wireless Receiver with 16 channels and 4 distinct groups of flashes

  • The included 16-channel, 4 group radio remote control transmitter gives you wireless control of up to seven lights from distances up to 328'. It allows you to adjust functions like flash power, the modeling lamp, audio beep and slave mode

  • 6-stop stepless power control range from full to 1/32 in 1/10 stop increments

  • Fast recycling time: 0.2 - 1.5 sec

  • A large easily-read LCD display on the rear of the unit gives you a clear indication of chosen settings

  • Pre-flash Detector System to enable use of a wide range of on-camera flashes

  • Multiple Modeling Light Modes: Proportional, Independent, Off

  • The soft-start function of modeling lamp protects the subject's and photographer's eyes, and increases the working life of the lamp

  • Sturdy, functional, and professional aluminum alloy housing

  • Anti-static, tactile rubberized surface treatment provides comfort and utility

  • Two Kinds of Recycling Reminder: Programmable ready beep function and modeling lamp visual indicator. The modeling lamp dims during recycling and comes on again when fully recycled

  • Fan-cooling provides longevity for the head's electronics, flashtube, and modeling lamp

  • Over-Heating Protection: When the flash reaches its maximum operating temperature it slows recycling time to reduce heat, rather than delay the shoot for a cool-down interval

  • 12.5 Amp fuse shuts the head down if necessary to prevent damage by electrical spikes

  • Low 5 VDC sync voltage protects your camera's electronics

  • Power auto-dump drains excess power from the capacitors when you reduce the output to guaranty accurate exposures

  • Stand bracket with extra umbrella fitting for larger umbrella shafts

  • Shifting pan/tilt support allows you to use large, pro-sized accessories

  • Compatible with Bowens Reflectors: Choose from a wide assortment of light-shapers that use the Bowens S-Type mount

  • Two white umbrellas with permanent black backing soften the light and set up quickly

  • Softbox with Speedring: The 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior has a removable front diffuser and interior baffle. The reflective interior minimizes light loss while the removable diffusers maximize creative options

  • Light Stands: 2, air-cushioned, 9.4', aluminum stands have repositionable studs to permit different mounting angles

  • The sturdy, wheeled, padded case has ample room for everything in the kit. Separate zippered compartments keep stands and umbrellas apart from the fixtures

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
Built-in 2.4 GHz wireless receiver with 16 channels and 4 distinct groups of flashes
The optional 16-channel, 4 group radio remote control transmitter gives you wireless control of up to seven lights from distances up to 328'. It allows you to adjust functions like flash power, the modeling lamp, audio beep and slave mode
6-stop power control range from full to 1/32 in 1/10 stop increments
Fast recycling time: 0.2 - 1.5 sec.
A large easily-read LCD display on the rear of the unit gives you a clear indication of chosen settings
Pre-flash Detector System to enable use of a wide range of on-camera flashes
Multiple Modeling Light modes: Proportional, Independent, Off
The soft-start function of the modeling lamp protects the subject's and photographer's eyes, and increase the working life of the lamp
Sturdy, functional and professional aluminum alloy housing
Anti-static, tactile rubberized surface treatment provides comfort and utility
Two kinds of recycling reminder: programmable ready beep function, and modeling lamp visual indicator. The modeling lamp dims during recycling and comes on again when fully recycled
Fan-cooling provides longevity for the head's electronics, flashtube and modeling lamp
Over-heating protection: when the flash reaches its maximum operating temperature it slows recycling time to reduce heat, rather than delay the shoot for a cool-down interval
12.5 Amp fuse shuts the head down if necessary to prevent damage by electrical spikes
Low 5 VDC sync voltage protects your camera's electronics
Power Auto-dump drains excess power from the capacitors when you reduce the output to guaranty accurate exposures
Stand bracket with extra umbrella fitting for larger umbrella shafts
Shifting pan/tilt support allows you to use large, pro-sized accessories
Compatible with reflectors: choose from a wide assortment of light-shapers that use the S-Type mount

FEATURE_NAME: Mounts Up to Two Speedlights and Radio Receivers
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Impact SR-SHOE-D makes it easy to achieve soft, beautiful light with gear you already own. It's equipped with four shoe mounts so it can hold up to two speedlights and radio receivers for optimal power and efficient recycling time.
FEATURES_RAW: The Impact SR-SHOE-D makes it easy to achieve soft, beautiful light with gear you already own. It's equipped with four shoe mounts so it can hold up to two speedlights and radio receivers for optimal power and efficient recycling time.

FEATURE_NAME: Accommodates Extra Small to Medium Size Softboxes
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Use the SR-SHOE-D to go from harsh, direct lighting to a soft, styled look. Attach extra small to medium size rectangular, square, strip, or octagonal softboxes to control and shape your light
FEATURES_RAW: Use the SR-SHOE-D to go from harsh, direct lighting to a soft, styled look. Attach extra small to medium size rectangular, square, strip, or octagonal softboxes to control and shape your light

FEATURE_NAME: 360° Rotating, Self-Locking Outer Ring with Labeled Rod Mounts
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The SR-SHOE-D is outfitted with a 360° rotating, self-locking outer ring for adjusting and fine-tuning your softbox's orientation on the fly. Labeled rod mounts ensure a no-hassle setup, saving you time and effort so you can start shooting
FEATURES_RAW: The SR-SHOE-D is outfitted with a 360° rotating, self-locking outer ring for adjusting and fine-tuning your softbox's orientation on the fly. Labeled rod mounts ensure a no-hassle setup, saving you time and effort so you can start shooting

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The SR-SHOE-D's dual-bracket mounting system makes it easy to manipulate the angles and depth of the speedlights within your softbox to adjust the beam spread. You can attach two flashes and radio receivers or just one flash and receiver, depending on your needs
FEATURES_RAW: The SR-SHOE-D's dual-bracket mounting system makes it easy to manipulate the angles and depth of the speedlights within your softbox to adjust the beam spread. You can attach two flashes and radio receivers or just one flash and receiver, depending on your needs

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Durable all-metal construction insures reliable performance. The SR-SHOE-D's collapsible design makes it practical to take on location
FEATURES_RAW: Durable all-metal construction insures reliable performance. The SR-SHOE-D's collapsible design makes it practical to take on location

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The universal 5/8" (16 mm) mounting adapter has sockets for a light stand or boom arm, plus a built-in pivoting stand adapter with a ratcheting handle to adjust the vertical angle
FEATURES_RAW: The universal 5/8" (16 mm) mounting adapter has sockets for a light stand or boom arm, plus a built-in pivoting stand adapter with a ratcheting handle to adjust the vertical angle

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
Ultra-fast 0.4 sec. recycle time at full power means you'll never miss a shot while waiting for your light to recycle
Speedy 1/5,000 sec. flash duration and 10 fps continuous shooting speed make this monolight great for event work as well as high-speed photography
Flash power output is up to 400W/s, with precise output control in 0.1 stop increments over a 6 stop range
Built-in 8mm umbrella mount and Bowens S-type bayonet mount allow you to attach light-modifiers like umbrellas, softboxes, and beauty dishes to customize and shape your light
Fan-cooling system, heat sinks, and speed-dedicated internal components prevent overheating when shooting at high speeds

<li>Speedy 1/5,000 sec. flash duration and 10 fps continuous shooting speed make this monolight great for event work as well as high-speed photography
<li>Flash power output is up to 400W/s, with precise output control in 0.1 stop increments over a 6 stop range
<li>Built-in 8mm umbrella mount and Bowens S-type bayonet mount allow you to attach light-modifiers like umbrellas, softboxes, and beauty dishes to customize and shape your light
<li>Fan-cooling system, heat sinks, and speed-dedicated internal components prevent overheating when shooting at high speeds

FEATURES_RAW: When a crisp and specular light is called for, the reflective silver interior of the Deep Umbrella creates a high-contrast light while maintaining some of the wrap-around qualities of a standard umbrella.

FEATURES_RAW: The Deep Umbrella is supported by its 16-rib design that maintains the umbrella's shape for an even, reflective surface.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The umbrella's deep shape controls light spread while providing a narrower beam than standard umbrellas, for photographers who want to focus light on their subjects while minimizing spill.
FEATURES_RAW: The umbrella's deep shape controls light spread while providing a narrower beam than standard umbrellas, for photographers who want to focus light on their subjects while minimizing spill.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: When a soft and even light is called for, the white interior of the Deep Umbrella creates a diffused light while still maintaining some of the wrap-around qualities of a standard umbrella.
FEATURES_RAW: When a soft and even light is called for, the white interior of the Deep Umbrella creates a diffused light while still maintaining some of the wrap-around qualities of a standard umbrella.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The 20" Smoothy softens and diffuses light, spreading light over a wide area.
FEATURES_RAW: The 20" Smoothy softens and diffuses light, spreading light over a wide area.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Compatible with most monolights and LEDs with S-mounts, the Smoothy can be attached to these light fixtures with a simple twist.
FEATURES_RAW: Compatible with most monolights and LEDs with S-mounts, the Smoothy can be attached to these light fixtures with a simple twist.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The 12" Smoothy is a great choice for general overhead, ambient lighting when shooting offices, conferences, or groups. It can also be used for room light, mood light, and portrait light.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
Glass Fresnel lens with adjustable-length housing focuses light
Rotating lens controls angle of the beam and adjusts from spot (10°) to flood (40°)
Brightness increases in spot position
Color gels included for special effects
Compatible with LED lights or monolight flashes with S-mounts
FEATURES_RAW:
<li>Glass Fresnel lens with adjustable-length housing focuses light
<li>Rotating lens controls angle of the beam and adjusts from spot (10°) to flood (40°)
<li>Brightness increases in spot position
<li>Color gels included for special effects
<li>Compatible with LED lights or monolight flashes with S-mounts

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Built-in 2.4 GHz wireless Receiver with 16 channels and 4 distinct groups of flashesThe included 16-channel, 4 group radio remote control transmitter gives you wireless control of up to seven lights from distances up to 328'. It allows you to adjust functions like flash power, the modeling lamp, audio beep and slave mode6-stop stepless power control range from full to 1/32 in 1/10 stop incrementsFast recycling time: 0.2 - 1.5 secA large easily-read LCD display on the rear of the unit gives you a clear indication of chosen settingsPre-flash Detector System to enable use of a wide range of on-camera flashesMultiple Modeling Light Modes: Proportional, Independent, OffThe soft-start function of modeling lamp protects the subject's and photographer's eyes, and increases the working life of the lampSturdy, functional, and professional aluminum alloy housingAnti-static, tactile rubberized surface treatment provides comfort and utilityTwo Kinds of Recycling Reminder: Programmable ready beep function and modeling lamp visual indicator. The modeling lamp dims during recycling and comes on again when fully recycledFan-cooling provides longevity for the head's electronics, flashtube, and modeling lampOver-Heating Protection: When the flash reaches its maximum operating temperature it slows recycling time to reduce heat, rather than delay the shoot for a cool-down interval12.5 Amp fuse shuts the head down if necessary to prevent damage by electrical spikesLow 5 VDC sync voltage protects your camera's electronicsPower auto-dump drains excess power from the capacitors when you reduce the output to guaranty accurate exposuresStand bracket with extra umbrella fitting for larger umbrella shaftsShifting pan/tilt support allows you to use large, pro-sized accessoriesCompatible with Bowens Reflectors: Choose from a wide assortment of light-shapers that use the Bowens S-Type mountTwo white umbrellas with permanent black backing soften the light and set up quicklySoftbox with Speedring: The 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior has a removable front diffuser and interior baffle. The reflective interior minimizes light loss while the removable diffusers maximize creative optionsLight Stands: 2, air-cushioned, 9.4', aluminum stands have repositionable studs to permit different mounting anglesThe sturdy, wheeled, padded case has ample room for everything in the kit. Separate zippered compartments keep stands and umbrellas apart from the fixtures
FEATURES_RAW:
• Built-in 2.4 GHz wireless Receiver with 16 channels and 4 distinct groups of flashes

  • The included 16-channel, 4 group radio remote control transmitter gives you wireless control of up to seven lights from distances up to 328'. It allows you to adjust functions like flash power, the modeling lamp, audio beep and slave mode

  • 6-stop stepless power control range from full to 1/32 in 1/10 stop increments

  • Fast recycling time: 0.2 - 1.5 sec

  • A large easily-read LCD display on the rear of the unit gives you a clear indication of chosen settings

  • Pre-flash Detector System to enable use of a wide range of on-camera flashes

  • Multiple Modeling Light Modes: Proportional, Independent, Off

  • The soft-start function of modeling lamp protects the subject's and photographer's eyes, and increases the working life of the lamp

  • Sturdy, functional, and professional aluminum alloy housing

  • Anti-static, tactile rubberized surface treatment provides comfort and utility

  • Two Kinds of Recycling Reminder: Programmable ready beep function and modeling lamp visual indicator. The modeling lamp dims during recycling and comes on again when fully recycled

  • Fan-cooling provides longevity for the head's electronics, flashtube, and modeling lamp

  • Over-Heating Protection: When the flash reaches its maximum operating temperature it slows recycling time to reduce heat, rather than delay the shoot for a cool-down interval

  • 12.5 Amp fuse shuts the head down if necessary to prevent damage by electrical spikes

  • Low 5 VDC sync voltage protects your camera's electronics

  • Power auto-dump drains excess power from the capacitors when you reduce the output to guaranty accurate exposures

  • Stand bracket with extra umbrella fitting for larger umbrella shafts

  • Shifting pan/tilt support allows you to use large, pro-sized accessories

  • Compatible with Bowens Reflectors: Choose from a wide assortment of light-shapers that use the Bowens S-Type mount

  • Two white umbrellas with permanent black backing soften the light and set up quickly

  • Softbox with Speedring: The 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior has a removable front diffuser and interior baffle. The reflective interior minimizes light loss while the removable diffusers maximize creative options

  • Light Stands: 2, air-cushioned, 9.4', aluminum stands have repositionable studs to permit different mounting angles

  • The sturdy, wheeled, padded case has ample room for everything in the kit. Separate zippered compartments keep stands and umbrellas apart from the fixtures

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: 15W modeling lamp featuring two modes: independent and proportional, each with Constant and Recycle Signal option
FEATURES_RAW: 15W modeling lamp featuring two modes: independent and proportional, each with Constant and Recycle Signal option

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Impact FRC-RLSL is a 19" continuous light source for portrait or product photography as well as video recording. It delivers a beautiful soft light that wraps around your subject without producing the harsh shadows from conventional light sources. It's effective in minimizing wrinkles and blemishes on your subject
FEATURES_RAW: The Impact FRC-RLSL is a 19" continuous light source for portrait or product photography as well as video recording. It delivers a beautiful soft light that wraps around your subject without producing the harsh shadows from conventional light sources. It's effective in minimizing wrinkles and blemishes on your subject

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Impact ring light emits a pleasing glow of 5200K, offering your photos a natural daylight color temperature
FEATURES_RAW: The Impact ring light emits a pleasing glow of 5200K, offering your photos a natural daylight color temperature

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: This ring light uses 70W of power which produces a low-heat output, allowing you to get close to your subject without causing them to overheat. This saves you from readjusting a model's make-up, or repositioning because your subject is uncomfortable
FEATURES_RAW: This ring light uses 70W of power which produces a low-heat output, allowing you to get close to your subject without causing them to overheat. This saves you from readjusting a model's make-up, or repositioning because your subject is uncomfortable

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Tungsten conversion panels adjust the ring light's output to cast a warmer color onto your scene. Match the look of candlelight or indoor lighting
FEATURES_RAW: Tungsten conversion panels adjust the ring light's output to cast a warmer color onto your scene. Match the look of candlelight or indoor lighting

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Diffuser panels clip onto the ring light housing and spread the light outward for a more even cast on your subject
FEATURES_RAW: Diffuser panels clip onto the ring light housing and spread the light outward for a more even cast on your subject

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: If the light burns out you can replace the 18" ring lamp. Keep an extra on hand for a quick change so you can continue shooting
FEATURES_RAW: If the light burns out you can replace the 18" ring lamp. Keep an extra on hand for a quick change so you can continue shooting

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The mini ball head allows you to attach a point-and-shoot or mirrorless camera in the center of the ring light. It has an adjustable ball head, so you can angle your camera in nearly any direction
FEATURES_RAW: The mini ball head allows you to attach a point-and-shoot or mirrorless camera in the center of the ring light. It has an adjustable ball head, so you can angle your camera in nearly any direction

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The beauty mirror is perfect for portrait photography. If your model needs to make a quick touch-up, they can see themselves and make corrections while you're readying the next picture
FEATURES_RAW: The beauty mirror is perfect for portrait photography. If your model needs to make a quick touch-up, they can see themselves and make corrections while you're readying the next picture

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The flexible mounting arm attaches the ring light to any standard 5/8" studded light stand. From there, you can bend the ring light into any position you need to light your subject
FEATURES_RAW: The flexible mounting arm attaches the ring light to any standard 5/8" studded light stand. From there, you can bend the ring light into any position you need to light your subject

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Shoot with your smartphone like a pro. The smartphone cradle clamps gently on your smartphone and has a cold shoe extension for other attachments such as a microphone
FEATURES_RAW: Shoot with your smartphone like a pro. The smartphone cradle clamps gently on your smartphone and has a cold shoe extension for other attachments such as a microphone

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: A padded carrying case keeps everything secure when you're traveling from location to location. Interior dividers separate the ring light from the accessories to prevent damage to the ring lamp
FEATURES_RAW: A padded carrying case keeps everything secure when you're traveling from location to location. Interior dividers separate the ring light from the accessories to prevent damage to the ring lamp

FEATURE_NAME: Holds 19" LED or Fluorescent Ring Lights

FEATURES_RAW: The Impact FRC-RL19CASE holds an LED or fluorescent ring light measuring up to 19"

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Impact Fluorescent Ring Light with Dimmer (FRC-RLSL), Impact 3-Lamp Fluorescent Ring Lamp 19" (FRC-RL19), and many other ring lights measuring up to 19"
FEATURES_RAW: Impact Fluorescent Ring Light with Dimmer (FRC-RLSL), Impact 3-Lamp Fluorescent Ring Lamp 19" (FRC-RL19), and many other ring lights measuring up to 19"

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The rigid unibody construction and padded interior protects your gear against the bumps and impact that occur during transport.
FEATURES_RAW: The rigid unibody construction and padded interior protects your gear against the bumps and impact that occur during transport.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Durable weather-resistant 600D ballistic nylon exterior shields contents from moisture, dust, dirt, and debris.
FEATURES_RAW: Durable weather-resistant 600D ballistic nylon exterior shields contents from moisture, dust, dirt, and debris.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Three padded adjustable dividers secure and protect your lights. Each divider is attached to the interior lining with heavy-duty touch fastener strips. Whether your bag is lying flat or standing upright, your lights and gear will be held firmly in place.
FEATURES_RAW: Three padded adjustable dividers secure and protect your lights. Each divider is attached to the interior lining with heavy-duty touch fastener strips. Whether your bag is lying flat or standing upright, your lights and gear will be held firmly in place.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Bright yellow interior fabric on the lining and dividers makes it easier to locate your gear under low light.
FEATURES_RAW: Bright yellow interior fabric on the lining and dividers makes it easier to locate your gear under low light.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Moving your gear from place to place is easy with the built-in, ball bearing casters. They easily glide over most surfaces and absorb the vibrations from rough floor or pavement.
FEATURES_RAW: Moving your gear from place to place is easy with the built-in, ball bearing casters. They easily glide over most surfaces and absorb the vibrations from rough floor or pavement.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: A large mesh pocket on the inner lid is ideal for securing and organizing cables, microphones, and other accessories. It can be zippered shut so that your gear stays secure and doesn't rattle around inside the bag.
FEATURES_RAW: A large mesh pocket on the inner lid is ideal for securing and organizing cables, microphones, and other accessories. It can be zippered shut so that your gear stays secure and doesn't rattle around inside the bag.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Photographers will appreciate the built-in business card/ID pocket located on top of the bag.
FEATURES_RAW: Photographers will appreciate the built-in business card/ID pocket located on top of the bag.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Using the sturdy, folding plastic grip puts the bag on the prefect angle to be pulled on its casters. The twin carry straps are handy for lifting the bag in or out of vans or car trunks.
FEATURES_RAW: Using the sturdy, folding plastic grip puts the bag on the prefect angle to be pulled on its casters. The twin carry straps are handy for lifting the bag in or out of vans or car trunks.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The heavy-duty zipper accommodates an optional, user-supplied padlock for extra security.
FEATURES_RAW: The heavy-duty zipper accommodates an optional, user-supplied padlock for extra security.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Upright standing is possible thanks to the two rubber feet located on the bottom of the bag opposite the wheels.
FEATURES_RAW: Upright standing is possible thanks to the two rubber feet located on the bottom of the bag opposite the wheels.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: For added protection the underside of the bag features two long rubber skid plates.
FEATURES_RAW: For added protection the underside of the bag features two long rubber skid plates.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Built-in 2.4 GHz wireless receiver with 16 channels and 4 distinct groups of flashesIncluded 16-channel, 4 group radio remote control transmitter for wireless control of up to seven lights from distances up to 328' to adjust functions like flash power, the modeling lamp, audio beep, and slave mode6-stop stepless power control range from full to 1/32 in 1/10 stop incrementsFast 0.2-1.5 sec recycling time An easily-read LED display on the rear of the unit that indicates output and other settings chosen by the userPre-flash Detector System to enable use of a wide range of on-camera flashesMultiple Modeling Light Modes: Proportional, Independent, OffSoft-start function of the modeling lamp to protect the subject's and photographer's eyes, and increase the working life of the lampSturdy, functional, and professional aluminum alloy housingAnti-static, tactile rubberized surface treatment provides comfort and utilityTwo Kinds of Recycling Reminders: Programmable ready beep function and modeling lamp visual indicator; modeling lamp dims during recycling and comes on again when fully recycledFan-cooling provides longevity for the head's electronics, flashtube, and modeling lampOver-Heating Protection: Slows recycling time to reduce heat, rather than delay the shoot for a cool-down interval12.5-amp fuse shuts the head down if necessary to prevent damage by electrical spikesLow 5 VDC sync voltage protects your camera's electronicsPower Auto-dump drains excess power from the capacitors when you reduce the output to guaranty accurate exposuresStand bracket with extra umbrella fitting for larger umbrella shaftsShifting pan/tilt support allows you to use large, pro-sized accessoriesCompatible with S-type reflectors: choose from a wide assortment of light-shapers that use the S-type mountThree white umbrellas with permanent black backing soften the light and set up quicklySoftbox with Speedring: 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior and removable front diffuser and interior baffle; reflective interior to minimize light loss, removable diffusers maximize creative optionsThe sturdy, wheeled, padded case with ample room for everything in the kit; separate zippered compartments keep stands and umbrellas apart from the fixtures
FEATURES_RAW:
• Built-in 2.4 GHz wireless receiver with 16 channels and 4 distinct groups of flashes

  • Included 16-channel, 4 group radio remote control transmitter for wireless control of up to seven lights from distances up to 328' to adjust functions like flash power, the modeling lamp, audio beep, and slave mode

  • 6-stop stepless power control range from full to 1/32 in 1/10 stop increments

  • Fast 0.2-1.5 sec recycling time 

  • An easily-read LED display on the rear of the unit that indicates output and other settings chosen by the user

  • Pre-flash Detector System to enable use of a wide range of on-camera flashes

  • Multiple Modeling Light Modes: Proportional, Independent, Off

  • Soft-start function of the modeling lamp to protect the subject's and photographer's eyes, and increase the working life of the lamp

  • Sturdy, functional, and professional aluminum alloy housing

  • Anti-static, tactile rubberized surface treatment provides comfort and utility

  • Two Kinds of Recycling Reminders: Programmable ready beep function and modeling lamp visual indicator; modeling lamp dims during recycling and comes on again when fully recycled

  • Fan-cooling provides longevity for the head's electronics, flashtube, and modeling lamp

  • Over-Heating Protection: Slows recycling time to reduce heat, rather than delay the shoot for a cool-down interval

  • 12.5-amp fuse shuts the head down if necessary to prevent damage by electrical spikes

  • Low 5 VDC sync voltage protects your camera's electronics

  • Power Auto-dump drains excess power from the capacitors when you reduce the output to guaranty accurate exposures

  • Stand bracket with extra umbrella fitting for larger umbrella shafts

  • Shifting pan/tilt support allows you to use large, pro-sized accessories

  • Compatible with S-type reflectors: choose from a wide assortment of light-shapers that use the S-type mount

  • Three white umbrellas with permanent black backing soften the light and set up quickly

  • Softbox with Speedring: 24 x 36" softbox with silver interior and removable front diffuser and interior baffle; reflective interior to minimize light loss, removable diffusers maximize creative options

    • The sturdy, wheeled, padded case with ample room for everything in the kit; separate zippered compartments keep stands and umbrellas apart from the fixtures

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The system has two switchable frequencies to avoid Radio Frequency (RF) interference caused by other electronic devices sharing the same frequency. Changing frequencies is as easy as switching the channel selector switch to the A or B setting. Each model (G1, G2, G3, or G4) operates in a different frequency range.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The FreeWave's Smart Code feature allows you to operate on 16,000,000 possible radio channels. No DIP switches need to be set, and one transmitter can trigger multiple receivers. The units have been synchronized at the factory, so your system can work right out of the box. However, to maximize signal quality and range, it is best to use the Smart Code technology to sense the "quiet" frequencies in your environment and re-synchronize on that channel.
FEATURES_RAW: The FreeWave's Smart Code feature allows you to operate on 16,000,000 possible radio channels. No DIP switches need to be set, and one transmitter can trigger multiple receivers. The units have been synchronized at the factory, so your system can work right out of the box. However, to maximize signal quality and range, it is best to use the Smart Code technology to sense the "quiet" frequencies in your environment and re-synchronize on that channel.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The FreeWave can fire the camera's shutter from distances up to 320 feet (100 meters).
FEATURES_RAW: The FreeWave can fire the camera's shutter from distances up to 320 feet (100 meters).

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger your camera wirelessly or wired. Wired triggering even works if the receiver battery is dead or missing.
FEATURES_RAW: Trigger your camera wirelessly or wired. Wired triggering even works if the receiver battery is dead or missing.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Press the transmitter's button half way to focus; press it fully to trigger the shutter.
FEATURES_RAW: Press the transmitter's button half way to focus; press it fully to trigger the shutter.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The two-second delay function gives you extra time to get into position.
FEATURES_RAW: The two-second delay function gives you extra time to get into position.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: You can take multiple shots with one press of the trigger.
FEATURES_RAW: You can take multiple shots with one press of the trigger.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: With the FreeWave you can control the length of the exposure remotely.
FEATURES_RAW: With the FreeWave you can control the length of the exposure remotely.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Two LED indicators confirm pre-focus and exposure when in the wireless mode.
FEATURES_RAW: Two LED indicators confirm pre-focus and exposure when in the wireless mode.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The FreeWave includes a camera release cable that works with your particular camera model. By simply changing to another cable (additional purchase required) a single receiver can work with many other cameras as well.
FEATURES_RAW: The FreeWave includes a camera release cable that works with your particular camera model. By simply changing to another cable (additional purchase required) a single receiver can work with many other cameras as well.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of "sleep-mode". Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Canon TTL system.
Note! If your flash does not have a wake-up function, you may be able to turn off sleep mode. Refer to your flash's manual for instructions.
FEATURES_RAW:
Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of "sleep-mode". Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Canon TTL system.

Note! If your flash does not have a wake-up function, you may be able to turn off sleep mode. Refer to your flash's manual for instructions.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of "sleep-mode". Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Nikon TTL system.
Note! If your flash does not have a wake-up function, you may be able to turn off sleep mode. Refer to your flash's manual for instructions.

Note! If your flash does not have a wake-up function, you may be able to turn off sleep mode. Refer to your flash's manual for instructions.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The FreeWave's Smart Code feature allows you to operate on 16,000,000 possible radio channels. No DIP switches need to be set, and one transmitter can trigger multiple receivers. The units have been synchronized at the factory, so your system can work right out of the box. However, to maximize signal quality and range, it is best to use the Smart Code technology to sense the "quiet" frequencies in your environment and re-synchronize on that channel.
FEATURES_RAW: The FreeWave's Smart Code feature allows you to operate on 16,000,000 possible radio channels. No DIP switches need to be set, and one transmitter can trigger multiple receivers. The units have been synchronized at the factory, so your system can work right out of the box. However, to maximize signal quality and range, it is best to use the Smart Code technology to sense the "quiet" frequencies in your environment and re-synchronize on that channel.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The FreeWave's Smart Code feature allows you to operate on 16,000,000 possible radio channels. No DIP switches need to be set, and one transmitter can trigger multiple receivers. The units have been synchronized at the factory, so your system can work right out of the box. However, to maximize signal quality and range, it is best to use the Smart Code technology to sense the "quiet" frequencies in your environment and re-synchronize on that channel.
FEATURES_RAW: The FreeWave's Smart Code feature allows you to operate on 16,000,000 possible radio channels. No DIP switches need to be set, and one transmitter can trigger multiple receivers. The units have been synchronized at the factory, so your system can work right out of the box. However, to maximize signal quality and range, it is best to use the Smart Code technology to sense the "quiet" frequencies in your environment and re-synchronize on that channel.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The FreeWave can fire the camera's shutter from distances up to 320 feet (100 meters).

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger your camera wirelessly or wired. Wired triggering even works if the receiver battery is dead or missing.

FEATURE_NAME: Gives Your Camera Setup Better Balance
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The ring adds stability to your camera and lens. Due to its weight, when the lens is mounted with a camera on a tripod, the center of gravity is shifted to the lens. The ring attaches to the tripod and can be shifted to adjust the balance.
FEATURES_RAW: The ring adds stability to your camera and lens. Due to its weight, when the lens is mounted with a camera on a tripod, the center of gravity is shifted to the lens. The ring attaches to the tripod and can be shifted to adjust the balance.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Having the camera secured with a ring around the lens makes it possible to rotate the lens between landscape and portrait modes without removing the camera from the tripod. The friction thumbscrews can then be tightened to secure the camera in the desired position. When not needed, the ring can be rotated to an out of the way position.
FEATURES_RAW: Having the camera secured with a ring around the lens makes it possible to rotate the lens between landscape and portrait modes without removing the camera from the tripod. The friction thumbscrews can then be tightened to secure the camera in the desired position. When not needed, the ring can be rotated to an out of the way position.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Having thumbscrews control the ring makes it easy to adjust the tripod ring on the go.
FEATURES_RAW: Having thumbscrews control the ring makes it easy to adjust the tripod ring on the go.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
The following cameras support live view monitoring on the wireless viewer when the AV cable is connected between the transmitter and camera:

 Nikon
D700
D300
D300s
D7000
D90
D5200
D5100
D5000
D3200
D3100

Additionally, remote shutter release and viewing using the built-in CCTV camera is possible by using an optional Vello RCC-C1, RCC-C2, RCC-N3, RCC-O1, RCC-O2, RCC-P1, or RCC-S1 cable for extensive camera support.
FEATURES_RAW:
The following cameras support live view monitoring on the wireless viewer when the AV cable is connected between the transmitter and camera:

Nikon
  • D700
  • D300
  • D300s
  • D7000
  • D90
  • D5200
  • D5100
  • D5000
  • D3200
  • D3100


    • Additionally, remote shutter release and viewing using the built-in CCTV camera is possible by using an optional Vello RCC-C1, RCC-C2, RCC-N3, RCC-O1, RCC-O2, RCC-P1, or RCC-S1 cable for extensive camera support.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The combination of the wireless live view monitor and transmitter enables real time monitoring of the scene at hand using either the compatible camera's live view source or the transmitter's built-in CCTV camera. This allows you to remotely view your composition and release the camera's shutter from a distance, making it ideal for photographing wildlife or shy subjects or for placing the camera in difficult-reach-positions.
FEATURES_RAW: The combination of the wireless live view monitor and transmitter enables real time monitoring of the scene at hand using either the compatible camera's live view source or the transmitter's built-in CCTV camera. This allows you to remotely view your composition and release the camera's shutter from a distance, making it ideal for photographing wildlife or shy subjects or for placing the camera in difficult-reach-positions.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The wireless live view monitor has a 3.5" (320 x 240) TFT-LCD screen for viewing either a live view image from the camera or a CCTV image from the transmitter's built-in camera. The viewer's design incorporates a shutter release button as well as controls for enlarging the transmitter's image, changing the radio channel, accessing the menu, and an LED power status indicator is also available for monitoring battery life. The shutter release supports half-press functionality for pre-focusing and setting the auto exposure and, additionally, single, continuous, bulb, and delayed shooting modes are supported. A 1/4"-20 socket is also integrated into the viewer for attaching to a stand or tripod. Power is provided to the viewer by either four AA batteries or a connected USB power source.
FEATURES_RAW: The wireless live view monitor has a 3.5" (320 x 240) TFT-LCD screen for viewing either a live view image from the camera or a CCTV image from the transmitter's built-in camera. The viewer's design incorporates a shutter release button as well as controls for enlarging the transmitter's image, changing the radio channel, accessing the menu, and an LED power status indicator is also available for monitoring battery life. The shutter release supports half-press functionality for pre-focusing and setting the auto exposure and, additionally, single, continuous, bulb, and delayed shooting modes are supported. A 1/4"-20 socket is also integrated into the viewer for attaching to a stand or tripod. Power is provided to the viewer by either four AA batteries or a connected USB power source.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The transmitter operates over an ISM 2.4GHz frequency, with four selectable channels, and provides up to a 200' working range from which to view a live view or CCTV image on the wireless viewer. The transmitter connects to the camera with dedicated cables to both a shutter release and AV input, or just to a camera's shutter release port if using only the built-in CCTV camera for monitoring. The integrated camera uses a 45mm (35mm equivalent focal length) lens to provide a slightly wider-than-normal perspective of the scene in front of the camera, and can attach to a camera via its hot shoe. Alternatively, a 1/4"-20 socket is also incorporated into the design for mounting to a stand or tripod. The transmitter also uses either four AA batteries or a connected USB power supply as its power source.
FEATURES_RAW: The transmitter operates over an ISM 2.4GHz frequency, with four selectable channels, and provides up to a 200' working range from which to view a live view or CCTV image on the wireless viewer. The transmitter connects to the camera with dedicated cables to both a shutter release and AV input, or just to a camera's shutter release port if using only the built-in CCTV camera for monitoring. The integrated camera uses a 45mm (35mm equivalent focal length) lens to provide a slightly wider-than-normal perspective of the scene in front of the camera, and can attach to a camera via its hot shoe. Alternatively, a 1/4"-20 socket is also incorporated into the design for mounting to a stand or tripod. The transmitter also uses either four AA batteries or a connected USB power supply as its power source.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: You can set the timer delays, exposure times, and intervals up to 99 hours, 59 minutes, 59 seconds in one second increments.
FEATURES_RAW: You can set the timer delays, exposure times, and intervals up to 99 hours, 59 minutes, 59 seconds in one second increments.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The ShutterBoss enables you to select anywhere from one to 399 continuous shots, or you can set the device to take an unlimited number of photos.
FEATURES_RAW: The ShutterBoss enables you to select anywhere from one to 399 continuous shots, or you can set the device to take an unlimited number of photos.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The four-line backlit LCD display panel gives you a visual reference so you can enable the following functions: self-timer, exposure, interval, and number of shots. It also is a status indicator for battery life, timer functions, lock indicator, number of shots, and more.
FEATURES_RAW: The four-line backlit LCD display panel gives you a visual reference so you can enable the following functions: self-timer, exposure, interval, and number of shots. It also is a status indicator for battery life, timer functions, lock indicator, number of shots, and more.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The ShutterBoss will give you an audible beep for the last three seconds of a countdown delay or interval. It will also beep to confirm your settings. The beep can be turned off if necessary.
FEATURES_RAW: The ShutterBoss will give you an audible beep for the last three seconds of a countdown delay or interval. It will also beep to confirm your settings. The beep can be turned off if necessary.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The ShutterBoss II has been updated with two new features, the Power Off option which gives the ability to power the device off to conserve battery life and the Reset option which allows the ShutterBoss to be reset to the default settings, so that each setting does not need to be reset individually.
FEATURES_RAW: The ShutterBoss II has been updated with two new features, the Power Off option which gives the ability to power the device off to conserve battery life and the Reset option which allows the ShutterBoss to be reset to the default settings, so that each setting does not need to be reset individually.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Powered by two AAA batteries, it can last for about 60 days of continuous shooting with intervals of five minutes and exposures of 4 minutes, 56 seconds. When left on standby, it can last for up to 2 years.
FEATURES_RAW: Powered by two AAA batteries, it can last for about 60 days of continuous shooting with intervals of five minutes and exposures of 4 minutes, 56 seconds. When left on standby, it can last for up to 2 years.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of sleep-mode. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Canon TTL system. If your flash does not have a wake up function, you may turn off sleep mode.
FEATURES_RAW: Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of sleep-mode. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Canon TTL system. If your flash does not have a wake up function, you may turn off sleep mode.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The transmitter features a top hot shoe, which fully supports TTL metering when used with TTL compatible components. This pass-through feature allows you to fire both TTL-controlled flash units controlled by the camera and manual units triggered by the transmitter, at the same time.
FEATURES_RAW: The transmitter features a top hot shoe, which fully supports TTL metering when used with TTL compatible components. This pass-through feature allows you to fire both TTL-controlled flash units controlled by the camera and manual units triggered by the transmitter, at the same time.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of sleep mode. Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Canon TTL system. The wake up function can be switched off for flash units without a sleep mode.
FEATURES_RAW: Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of sleep mode. Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Canon TTL system. The wake up function can be switched off for flash units without a sleep mode.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The collar and ring secure your lens directly to the camera's tripod.
FEATURES_RAW: The collar and ring secure your lens directly to the camera's tripod.

FEATURE_NAME: Gives Your Camera Setup Better Balance
FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Due to the weight of a large lens, when the lens and camera are mounted on a tripod, the center of gravity is shifted to the lens. Placement of the collar on the lens allows the balance to be shifted for a more stable set up and to reduce strain on the camera mount.
FEATURES_RAW: Due to the weight of a large lens, when the lens and camera are mounted on a tripod, the center of gravity is shifted to the lens. Placement of the collar on the lens allows the balance to be shifted for a more stable set up and to reduce strain on the camera mount.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Having the camera secured with a ring around the lens makes it possible to rotate the lens between landscape and portrait modes without removing the camera from the tripod. The friction thumbscrews can then be tightened to secure the camera in the desired position. Thumbscrews make it easy to adjust the tripod ring on the go.
FEATURES_RAW: Having the camera secured with a ring around the lens makes it possible to rotate the lens between landscape and portrait modes without removing the camera from the tripod. The friction thumbscrews can then be tightened to secure the camera in the desired position. Thumbscrews make it easy to adjust the tripod ring on the go.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The collar can be easily removed so as not to get in the way when shooting without a tripod.
FEATURES_RAW: The collar can be easily removed so as not to get in the way when shooting without a tripod.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: With the included bushing, either a 3/8" or a 1/4"-20 tripod mount can be used.
FEATURES_RAW: With the included bushing, either a 3/8" or a 1/4"-20 tripod mount can be used.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Utilizing Bluetooth radio frequency to communicate with apple devices, you can wirelessly program the intervalometer and trigger the camera.
FEATURES_RAW: Utilizing Bluetooth radio frequency to communicate with apple devices, you can wirelessly program the intervalometer and trigger the camera.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: This device allows you to schedule up to 10 shooting sessions for anytime in the future.
FEATURES_RAW: This device allows you to schedule up to 10 shooting sessions for anytime in the future.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: To set the intervalometer and trigger the camera shutter, simply download the free Vello Bluetooth ShutterBoss app from the App Store on your compatible Apple device.
FEATURES_RAW: To set the intervalometer and trigger the camera shutter, simply download the free Vello Bluetooth ShutterBoss app from the App Store on your compatible Apple device.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Intervalometer mode allows you to choose the duration of a time lapse, how many shots are in the time lapse, and the interval between exposures. You set the shutter speed, aperture, ISO, and focus in-camera before starting your time lapse.
FEATURES_RAW: Intervalometer mode allows you to choose the duration of a time lapse, how many shots are in the time lapse, and the interval between exposures. You set the shutter speed, aperture, ISO, and focus in-camera before starting your time lapse.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The ShutterBoss can also act as a standard wireless shutter release. From the home page of the app you can choose between single mode, continuous mode, bulb mode, and self-timer mode. Each mode has its own button that swipes to the right to trigger the shutter.
FEATURES_RAW: The ShutterBoss can also act as a standard wireless shutter release. From the home page of the app you can choose between single mode, continuous mode, bulb mode, and self-timer mode. Each mode has its own button that swipes to the right to trigger the shutter.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Full E-TTL functionality for Canon cameras that work with Canon E-TTL flashes Adjustable TTL EV allows fine tuning of TTL settings to match your vision 4 Separate channels with a digitally coded 2.4 GHz signal Multiple shutter release triggering options High Speed Sync function allows for a maximum sync speed of up to 1/8,000 second (in TTL mode) Second Curtain Sync enables the user to create special effects and "after blur" images

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Control the High Speed Sync (HSS) function from the device. This mode allows your camera to set the shutter speed faster than a flash would normally be able to fire in sync with. HSS mode instructs the flash to fire multiple short pulses of light to match the shutter's speed. Your camera/flash manual will indicate how you can access this mode

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Second Curtain Sync (SCS) mode fires a flash at the end of an exposure rather than at the beginning to create the illusion of motion in an image. This yields natural-looking blur trails behind the moving subject such as those seen in night shots of speeding cars

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The collar allows you to attach the lens to your tripod or monopod, instead of your camera, thus reducing stress on the camera's lens mount.
FEATURES_RAW: The collar allows you to attach the lens to your tripod or monopod, instead of your camera, thus reducing stress on the camera's lens mount.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Having the camera secured with a ring around the lens makes it possible to rotate the lens between landscape and portrait modes without removing the camera from the tripod. The friction thumbscrews can then be tightened to secure the camera in the desired position. When not needed, the foot can be rotated to an out of the way position.
FEATURES_RAW: Having the camera secured with a ring around the lens makes it possible to rotate the lens between landscape and portrait modes without removing the camera from the tripod. The friction thumbscrews can then be tightened to secure the camera in the desired position. When not needed, the foot can be rotated to an out of the way position.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The thumbscrew loosens to allow collar rotation, but must be pulled out from the collar in order to remove it from the lens. This prevents accidental drops.
FEATURES_RAW: The thumbscrew loosens to allow collar rotation, but must be pulled out from the collar in order to remove it from the lens. This prevents accidental drops.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Vello FWIRC-C FreeWave Commander makes full use of your flashes' built-in E-TTL technology. Its infrared transmitter offers wireless remote flash triggering for multiple flashes. In E-TTL mode, you'll be able to use the Commander to automatically set the appropriate flash level via your camera's E-TTL metering system data, calculating the correct power for all communicating E-TTL-compatible flashes. E-TTL Flash Ratios Achieve a professional level of creative control with up to three E-TTL groups by setting flash ratios at different power outputs. The Commander offers two E-TTL ratio modes, so you can adjust the power output ratios for two or three groups, as well as EV.
FEATURES_RAW:
The Vello FWIRC-C FreeWave Commander makes full use of your flashes' built-in E-TTL technology. Its infrared transmitter offers wireless remote flash triggering for multiple flashes. In E-TTL mode, you'll be able to use the Commander to automatically set the appropriate flash level via your camera's E-TTL metering system data, calculating the correct power for all communicating E-TTL-compatible flashes.
E-TTL Flash Ratios
Achieve a professional level of creative control with up to three E-TTL groups by setting flash ratios at different power outputs. The Commander offers two E-TTL ratio modes, so you can adjust the power output ratios for two or three groups, as well as EV.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Commander pivots atop your camera to achieve easy infrared line-of-sight positioning with your flashes' IR sensors.
FEATURES_RAW: The Commander pivots atop your camera to achieve easy infrared line-of-sight positioning with your flashes' IR sensors.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Position your slave flash units individually or combine an unlimited number of flashes in up to three groups to function as main, fill, accent, and other lights.
FEATURES_RAW: Position your slave flash units individually or combine an unlimited number of flashes in up to three groups to function as main, fill, accent, and other lights.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Enjoy enhanced wireless operation, even in busy environments. Choose from four channels to prevent your flashes from being triggered by other photographers working with similar systems nearby.
FEATURES_RAW: Enjoy enhanced wireless operation, even in busy environments. Choose from four channels to prevent your flashes from being triggered by other photographers working with similar systems nearby.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Sync at shutter speeds as fast as 1/8000 second-High-Speed Sync mode allows your flash to exceed your camera's maximum sync speed. It's perfect for using large apertures, when freezing motion, or shooting in bright conditions.
FEATURES_RAW: Sync at shutter speeds as fast as 1/8000 second-High-Speed Sync mode allows your flash to exceed your camera's maximum sync speed. It's perfect for using large apertures, when freezing motion, or shooting in bright conditions.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Commander's automatic standby mode reduces power consumption and saves on battery life. An onscreen indicator makes it easy to distinguish between standby and off.
FEATURES_RAW: The Commander's automatic standby mode reduces power consumption and saves on battery life. An onscreen indicator makes it easy to distinguish between standby and off.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The FreeWave Commander's internal memory remembers your current settings so you won't have to. When you turn the Commander on, all your previous settings will return as before.
FEATURES_RAW: The FreeWave Commander's internal memory remembers your current settings so you won't have to. When you turn the Commander on, all your previous settings will return as before.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Create unique effects in which moving objects appear several times in the frame or capture extremely fast objects as the flash pulsates faster than your camera lens can open and close.
FEATURES_RAW: Create unique effects in which moving objects appear several times in the frame or capture extremely fast objects as the flash pulsates faster than your camera lens can open and close.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The modeling light minimizes guesswork by approximating how the flash will illuminate your subject. The flash pulses rapidly to present the appearance of a continuous lighting source, simulating the direction of light. It's easy to use-just press your camera's Depth of Field Preview button.
FEATURES_RAW: The modeling light minimizes guesswork by approximating how the flash will illuminate your subject. The flash pulses rapidly to present the appearance of a continuous lighting source, simulating the direction of light. It's easy to use-just press your camera's Depth of Field Preview button.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: With flash exposure bracketing, you can take continuous pictures while automatically changing flash exposure compensation. It's great for shooting when lighting is changing rapidly and other situations in which it's difficult to determine the appropriate flash exposure.
FEATURES_RAW: With flash exposure bracketing, you can take continuous pictures while automatically changing flash exposure compensation. It's great for shooting when lighting is changing rapidly and other situations in which it's difficult to determine the appropriate flash exposure.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Use the flash value lock (FV Lock) feature to lock the flash output level that's optimal for specific elements of the scene. Lock the EV at a specific setting and override the automation to customize your exposure.
FEATURES_RAW: Use the flash value lock (FV Lock) feature to lock the flash output level that's optimal for specific elements of the scene. Lock the EV at a specific setting and override the automation to customize your exposure.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Vello FWIRC-N FreeWave Commander makes full use of your flashes' built-in i-TTL technology. Its infrared transmitter offers wireless remote flash triggering for multiple flashes. In i-TTL mode, you'll be able to use the Commander to automatically set the appropriate flash level via your camera's i-TTL metering system data to calculate the correct power for all communicating i-TTL-compatible flashes.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Position your slave flash units individually or combine an unlimited number of flashes in up to three groups to function as main, fill, accent, and other lights. FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The FreeWave Fusion Basic can wirelessly trigger your hot-shoe flashes, studio lights, or camera from up to 328' away. You can also use it as a wireless "cable release" for wildlife or on a tripod for macro work.
FEATURES_RAW: The FreeWave Fusion Basic can wirelessly trigger your hot-shoe flashes, studio lights, or camera from up to 328' away. You can also use it as a wireless "cable release" for wildlife or on a tripod for macro work.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: This low frequency signal can pass through and around obstructions offering you greater flexibility in placement of your flash units and camera.
FEATURES_RAW: This low frequency signal can pass through and around obstructions offering you greater flexibility in placement of your flash units and camera.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Take advantage of sync speeds that match the rating of your camera up to 1/250 sec.
FEATURES_RAW: Take advantage of sync speeds that match the rating of your camera up to 1/250 sec.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The wireless system's 16 channels allow you to change your transmitter/receiver settings to avoid interference from other wireless devices.
FEATURES_RAW: The wireless system's 16 channels allow you to change your transmitter/receiver settings to avoid interference from other wireless devices.

FEATURES_RAW: You can use multiple receivers to trigger many flashes with a single transmitter. You can also trigger multiple cameras with additional receivers and shutter release cables.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION:
Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of "sleep-mode". Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Nikon TTL system.
Note! If your flash does not have a wake-up function, you may be able to turn off sleep mode. Refer to your flash's manual for instructions.

Simply depress the trigger button on the transmitter half-way to pull the flash out of "sleep-mode". Sleep mode allows the flash to power down in between shooting sessions to extend battery life. The wake-up function is only available when used as part of a complete Nikon TTL system.

Note! If your flash does not have a wake-up function, you may be able to turn off sleep mode. Refer to your flash's manual for instructions.

FEATURES_RAW: The ShutterBoss enables you to select anywhere from one to 399 continuous shots, or you can set the device to take an unlimited number of photos.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The four-line backlit LCD display panel gives you a visual reference so you can enable the following functions: self-timer, exposure, interval, and number of shots. It also is a status indicator for battery life, timer functions, lock indicator, number of shots, and more.

• Allows a Nikon F-mount lens to be used with a full-frame or APS-C format Sony E-mount camera

  • Locking mechanism for secure attachment of lens with push-button release
  • Detachable tripod foot with 1/4"-20 threads
