FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Extendá connects directly to a DSLR with a USB cable and then creates an ad-hoc Wi-Fi network, allowing users to remotely control their camera using an application available on iOS, Android, Mac, or Windows devices. The Wi-Fi network has a range of 164', while an Ethernet port supports a wired connection to a computer.
FEATURES_RAW: The Extendá connects directly to a DSLR with a USB cable and then creates an ad-hoc Wi-Fi network, allowing users to remotely control their camera using an application available on iOS, Android, Mac, or Windows devices. The Wi-Fi network has a range of 164', while an Ethernet port supports a wired connection to a computer.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Users will be able to remotely change settings such as shutter speed, ISO, aperture, exposure compensation, white balance, and more.
FEATURES_RAW: Users will be able to remotely change settings such as shutter speed, ISO, aperture, exposure compensation, white balance, and more.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Live view mode provides a real-time stream from the camera to your device. This allows you to preview images, using a larger and more detailed screen, before they are taken.
FEATURES_RAW: Live view mode provides a real-time stream from the camera to your device. This allows you to preview images, using a larger and more detailed screen, before they are taken.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The Extendá app supports touch focus/tap-to-focus functionality. This means you can just tap on your device's touchscreen to select which area of the scene to focus on. Alternatively, users can also manually control focus by adjusting the focal plane forward or backwards in small increments.
FEATURES_RAW: The Extendá app supports touch focus/tap-to-focus functionality. This means you can just tap on your device's touchscreen to select which area of the scene to focus on. Alternatively, users can also manually control focus by adjusting the focal plane forward or backwards in small increments.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Set up the app for auto viewing of images to have each image streamed to a mobile device or computer immediately following capture. This allows a client or assistant to easily review images as they are taken. Also, users can use the Extendá app to browse images on the card and then select images to save to your mobile device or computer.
FEATURES_RAW: Set up the app for auto viewing of images to have each image streamed to a mobile device or computer immediately following capture. This allows a client or assistant to easily review images as they are taken. Also, users can use the Extendá app to browse images on the card and then select images to save to your mobile device or computer.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Create advanced timed exposures with the controls provided by the Extendá app. This includes delay timers for countdowns before your shot as well as an intervalometer for setting up time-lapses. A bulb mode is available as well for long exposures.
FEATURES_RAW: Create advanced timed exposures with the controls provided by the Extendá app. This includes delay timers for countdowns before your shot as well as an intervalometer for setting up time-lapses. A bulb mode is available as well for long exposures.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Focus stacking will allow you to take a series of photos with varying focus points that can be combined in post-processing software to create a single image with a wide depth-of-field.
FEATURES_RAW: Focus stacking will allow you to take a series of photos with varying focus points that can be combined in post-processing software to create a single image with a wide depth-of-field.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Set up bracketing in order to make sure you don't miss the shot. This mode offers options for exposure bracketing using shutter speed, aperture, ISO, and exposure compensation. This tool can be used to help create HDR images using post-processing software.
FEATURES_RAW: Set up bracketing in order to make sure you don't miss the shot. This mode offers options for exposure bracketing using shutter speed, aperture, ISO, and exposure compensation. This tool can be used to help create HDR images using post-processing software.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: A rule-of-thirds grid is available to help with composition in stills and video.
FEATURES_RAW: A rule-of-thirds grid is available to help with composition in stills and video.

FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Powered by a built-in 3.7V 1800mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery, the Extendá can also be used to recharge mobile devices via its USB port.
FEATURES_RAW: Powered by a built-in 3.7V 1800mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery, the Extendá can also be used to recharge mobile devices via its USB port.
